titleStmt.title: The shepheardes complaint A passionate eclogue, written in English hexameters: wherevnto are annexed other conceits, brieflie expressing the effects of loues impressions, and the iust punishment of aspiring beautie. By I.D.
titleStmt.author: Dickenson, John, romance writer.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By E. Allde] for William Blackewall, and are to be sold at his shop ouer against Guild-hal Gate,

notesStmt.note: I.D. = John Dickenson, whose name appears on A2r.
Printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop ouer against Guild-hal Gate
